DOC.brief_title: Epidural Nalbuphine Postcesarean Epidural Morphine Induced Pruritus
DOC.detailed_description: 182 parturients , ASA 1-2 undergoing cesarean section epidural block enrol study . After obtain informed consent , receive epidural anesthesia use 2 % lidocaine epinephrine 1:200000 via epidural cathetes L2-3 L3-4 volume suffient achieve T4 sensory level bilaterally . After umbilical cord clamp , patient assign randomly three groups.The placebo group , N-5 group , N-10 group receive 4 ml epidural solution contain morphine 4 mg plus either saline , nalbuphine 5 mg , nalbuphine 10 mg respectively.At post anesthetic care unit , intravenous pethidine PCA administer inadequate pain control . Outcome measure : Incidence severity postoperative pruritus Quality pain control Side effect epidural morphine nalbuphine respiratory depression , sedation
DOC.criteria: full term parturient undergo elective cesarean section ASA 12 drug alcohol abuse contraindication regional anesthesia receive opioids within 12 hour
